div.p: For the safety of our staff and the community during the COVID-19 outbreak, the NOACSC Office will be closed to the public until further notice. Our staff is working from home and have all of the access and tools they need to support you. Please don’t hesitate to contact any NOACSC staff member thru our normal channels.

div.style: border: 1px solid #6D6D6D; padding: 25px 0px 20px 28px; border-radius: 8px; box-shadow: 2px 2px 4px #6C6E5F; width: 400px;

div.h3: Proudly serving education in these Ohio counties…
div.p: The Northwest Ohio Area Computer Services Cooperative (NOACSC) is a regional computer services provider offering services to public and non-public school districts in northwest Ohio.

As one of 18 regional Information Technology Centers (ITC) that provide such services to the entire state of Ohio, we began in 1980 with the sole purpose of providing computer services to school district financial offices. Since then, services have been added that benefit school counselors, administrators, teachers, librarians, Fema students and parents.

4277 East Road
Elida, Ohio 45807 [map]
Phone: 419-228-7417
Fax: 419-222-5635
Be sure to use Elida as city in GPS, Google Maps, etc...
